it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.calendar

Class BreakEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.GenericEntity
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.EntityWithLongKey
        • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.calendar.GenericEvent
          • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.calendar.BreakEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GenericEvent>

    @Entity(name="BREAK_EVENT")
public class BreakEvent
extends GenericEvent
    This JPA class represent a break event
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long minimumTime
      Minimum amount of "free time" that has to be satisfied in order to guarantee that the break event is scheduled
      private static long serialVersionUID

      • isMinimumEnsuredNoPathRegard

        public boolean isMinimumEnsuredNoPathRegard(java.util.List<Event> events)
        This method checks if is possible, with the provided events, to ensure the minimum amount of time for the break event. No event's paths are taken into account in this method.
        Parameters:
        events - Events overlapping with this breakEvent instance
        Returns:
        true if the minimum time is guaranteed, false otherwise

      • isMinimumEnsuredWithPathRegard

        public boolean isMinimumEnsuredWithPathRegard(java.util.List<Event> events)
        This method checks if is possible, with the provided events, to ensure the minimum amount of time for the break event. Event's paths are taken into account in this method.
        Parameters:
        events - Events overlapping with this breakEvent instance
        Returns:
        true if the minimum time is guaranteed, false otherwise

      • enoughTimeBeforeFirstEvent

        private boolean enoughTimeBeforeFirstEvent(Event event)
        Checks if the minimum time is guaranteed considering only the first event ( in time ) that overlaps with the break event
        Parameters:
        event - the first event that overlaps in time
        Returns:
        true if the minimum time is guaranteed, false otherwise

      • enoughTimeWithLastEvent

        private boolean enoughTimeWithLastEvent(Event event)
        Checks if the minimum time is guaranteed considering only the last event ( in time ) that overlaps with the break event
        Parameters:
        event - the first event that overlaps in time
        Returns:
        true if the minimum time is guaranteed, false otherwise

      • swap

        public java.util.List<GenericEvent> swap(PathManager pathManager)
                                  throws GMapsGeneralException
        Visitor method used during the swap of a genericEvent, it is used to call the right method for all possible subclasses of GenericEvent
        Specified by:
        swap in class GenericEvent
        Parameters:
        pathManager - manager who is handling the swap
        Returns:
        a list of modified ( due to the swap ) events
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if Google Maps services are unavailable

        public boolean isOverlapFreeIntoSchedule(ScheduleManager scheduleManager)
        Visitor method used during the scheduling computation process of an event, it is used to check if the event overlaps with other events
        Specified by:
        isOverlapFreeIntoSchedule in class GenericEvent
        Parameters:
        scheduleManager - manager which is handling the scheduling process of the event
        Returns:
        true if the event does not overlap with other events, false otherwise

      • removeFeasiblePath

        public void removeFeasiblePath()
        Removes the feasible path of an event, used when the event is put into the non scheduled list Obviously, since break events doesn't have feasible paths, this method simply do nothing
        Specified by:
        removeFeasiblePath in class GenericEvent
